short_summary: RFSO Heavy Vehicules Inspection and Repair Services
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on December 21, 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Department of National Defence is issuing this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Heavy Vehicles Inspection and Repair Services located in St-Jean sur le Richelieu, Qu...
